---
title: "Projected Daily Weather Extremes for Nome, AK"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit(echo = FALSE)

# make df from results of both models
mk_df <- function(cm3, ccsm4) {
  mods <- c("CM3", "CCSM4")
  cm3 <- cm3 %>%
    mutate(gcm = factor("CM3", levels = mods))
  ccsm4 %>%
    mutate(gcm = factor("CCSM4", levels = mods)) %>%
    bind_rows(cm3) %>%
    filter(date >= "2020-01-01" & date <= "2099-01-01") %>%
    mutate(decade = as.factor(floor(year(date)/10) * 10))
}

count_tmin <- function(df, thr = -35) {
  df %>% 
    group_by(gcm, decade) %>%
    summarise(days = sum(sim_adj <= thr, na.rm = TRUE))
}

count_sf <- function(df, thr = 0.2) {
  df %>% 
    group_by(gcm, decade) %>%
    summarise(days = sum(sim_adj >= thr, na.rm = TRUE))
}

mk_barplot <- function(df) {
  ylim <- ceiling(max(df$days)) + 2
  ggplot(df, aes(x = decade, y = days, fill = gcm)) + 
    geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity") + 
    geom_text(
      aes(label = days), 
      position = position_dodge(width = 0.9), 
      vjust = -0.25
    ) + 
    scale_y_continuous(
      breaks = 0:ylim, 
      expand = expand_scale(mult = c(0, .1))
    ) + 
    theme_classic()
}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)

# run off server
gcm_tmin <- readRDS("../Nome_Mets_aux/data/gcm_t2min_adj.Rds")
gcm_sf <- readRDS("../Nome_Mets_aux/data/gcm_sf_adj.Rds")
# run locally
#gcm_tmin <- readRDS("X:/Nome_Mets_aux/data/gcm_t2min_adj.Rds")
#gcm_sf <- readRDS("X:/Nome_Mets_aux/data/gcm_sf_adj.Rds")

tmin_df <- mk_df(gcm_tmin[[2]], gcm_tmin[[4]])
sf_df <- mk_df(gcm_sf[[2]], gcm_sf[[4]])

```

# Extreme low temperatures

```{r extreme_tmin} 
tmin_df %>%
  count_tmin %>%
  mk_barplot

```

# Extreme snowfall events
Days where snowfall exceeds 20 cm
```{r extreme_sf} 
sf_df %>%
  count_sf %>%
  mk_barplot

```
